content: slip the slipped s cid 415 tch over and knit another s cid 415 tch turn the work con cid 415 nue in this way un cid 415 l all the increased s cid 415 tches have been kni cid 425 ed off then work in the round again and work the upper foot in the basic pa cid 425 ern the sole is kni cid 425 ed in stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch a cid 332 er a total of 145 row i have not counted the decrease row which are not full row i have started the band cid 415 p in which decreases are made as follows this applies to sizes 36-43 in the first round knit the third last and second last s cid 415 tch together at the end of the 1st and 3rd needle knit the first s cid 415 tch on needles 2 and 4 then slip a s cid 415 tch knit the next s cid 415 tch and slip the slipped s cid 415 tch over the third s cid 415 tch all other s cid 415 tches are kni cid 425 ed in stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch repeat this process knit once a cid 332 er three row twice a cid 332 er 2 row in stockine cid 425 e s cid 415 tch knit three cid 415 mes a cid 332 er one row then work decreases in each row un cid 415 l there are only 8 s cid 415 tches le cid 332 on the needles translated with deepl com free version
